No. COA15-426. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. April 5, 2016.

In the Matter of the foreclosure of a Deed of Trust Executed by Robert Glenn CULLIFER, Jr. and Wife, Margaret P. Cullifer Dated October 4, 2007 and Recorded in Book 2957, Page 95, Onslow County Registry, to John Cameron Coburn Trustee.

Case Reported Without Published Opinion

Affirmed.
